column4: I've got a question. I currently run Ubuntu 10.04. I've run several Linux systems in the last two years. My boyfriend would like to check out Ubuntu. I'm thinking Wubi Installer. How is installing with Wubi different than installing from a regular disk?
@reiso Ok. I just don't want to f*ck up his computer. I've done a partition/install several dozen times, but not with XP.
Because they thought it would look pretty, I think!
linux detects windows xp just fine
